website_summaries.verdict: A good budget buy. Though not as durable as costlier models, it has lots of user-friendly features.
pros: Spacious for most kids and adults (63 by 33 inches)
Comes with repair kit in case of air leaks
cons: The arm rests and pillow tend to leak air

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best float ever for the price!!! I was expecting something a little flimsy but wow!!! Anyone who gives this a bad review is crazy! Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison M. Sieck

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lakeside floaty
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I have both purchased this style of float in the past. We use them for out at our cabin on a lake so they typically last 1-2 seasons before someone drags it over the ground and it gets a hole, but we keep buying them because they DO last if taken care of properly and they are a good lake float. They keep you dry enough and not too high so you can paddle out and drift w/o trouble. Also the cup holder is decent and the leg opening makes cooling off easy with actually getting IN the water.
customer_reviews.author: sj_reviews

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe the quality of this for the price. The thin cheapy ones cost the same and get holes so easily. I am rough on them, and it has been sorely tested and still looks brand new a month later. It's great for sitting in the pool reading or talking. If I want to lay down, I can let a bit of air out and turn it upside down and it gives you a gentle slope for sunbathing. So comfortable I regularly fall asleep on it in the pool. Looks really nice too. People think I paid $30 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ziminy13

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the Inflatable raft for a few weeks, but so far so good. I don't give it a terribly hard workout, but I do get some nice, relaxing afternoons on it. For the money it's not bad at all. Check out some the questions and answers that go with this product. Search for the quests about inflating the two pieces of the raft. Personally, it took me less than 10 minutes to inflate the whole thing by blowing it up manually. The trick to it is making sure you squeeze the valve just right as you blow it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tony from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great, Especially For the Addon Price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. It stays fairly stable, level. The drink holder cannot hold a glass of wine but cans are fine. The whole isn't big enough for an average sized adult to fit through easily. Overall this is a good float for kids or smaller adults. Be aware that I paid the Add-on price of about $5, which did give it an extra star. Worked great for my wife, 5'7" 120lbs. Was a little hard to use for me, 5'10" 210lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Informative Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy to float on
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy to float on, really difficult to inflate. Our electric air pump had to be pushed into the valve as far as possible, and even then I had to squeeze the valve really hard to move the flap in order for the air to be allowed through. It all had to be placed just right then don't even think about moving or adjusting once you notice it finally inflating. Once you find the sweet spot it's fine. Overall it's decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: joviebee

customer_reviews.title: Great raft at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Really great raft at a great price. Floats myself (110 lbs) and my husband (175 lbs), separately of course, without letting water on the raft like flimsy ones do. The upright recliner part is great for comfortably laying back on, and I can lay face down on it for 15 mins or so before it gets too uncomfortable and awkward, which is when I just flip back onto my back. They are holding up to the kids playing rough with them as well. I would definitely recommend them. (I bought 2, but they are sold individually).
customer_reviews.author: Markelle

customer_reviews.title: Its a Nice lounger. However, it is not Durable.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one on April 11 and had it in our pool and it buster at the seam. However, our grandchildren were rough housing in the pool. So we thought it was there fault. We ordered another one on May 21st. My husband likes it to float around the pool in it. well He went to get in it today and it split along the seem again. No rough housing or mis use. So unless you want to replace this every few weeks I would not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: ... around the pool during hot summers and they were perfect! He would grab onto the arm of mine ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for me and my boyfriend to float around the pool during hot summers and they were perfect! He would grab onto the arm of mine like an otter so we could float together. I find them very comfortable and great for parties! The price is excellent and they lasted an entire summer! Even if I go to use them next summer and they end up having a hole or something, I think I got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLiz

customer_reviews.title: It works fine for me and for the price it's even better
customer_reviews.text: This is well made but a little small than I thought. My husband has a hard time staying on it but why be in a pool if you don't want to get wet. lol. It works fine for me and for the price it's even better.
customer_reviews.author: CJmom

customer_reviews.title: The kids and adults love it
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of time to blow up by mouth but not impossible. I have a battery operated inflater that just didn't work so I had to blow them up (2) by mouth. Was a hassle so use the motorized inflator. But after that a full day of fun in the water. And the deflation same as the inflation just a bit to.e consuming. This is truly a durable float. Thumbs up. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: Hiromi100

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: From day one, the back rest portion of this would not stay fully inflated. I kept assuming I didn’t inflate it enough, or that I didn’t press the port closed all the way. However, with closer inspection of the seam, there are multiple areas where it simply has not been fused – micro leaks that allow the air to escape. Poorly made, spend your money on something better.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping IS Therapy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite float
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have purchased this float. I buy one every summer now. They are the most comfortable pool float I've ever found. Unfortunately they do not last for long. Two days into using this one, I had a small hole on the bottom, even tho I never removed it from my pool. Fortunately I was able to fix it with a patch kit. But for the price, I do not mind having to mend mine. I will buy another when this one becomes unfixable.
customer_reviews.author: Ferballz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: These have been used in our pool for a very long time. The quality is great and you can't beat the price. The one thing that some people may not like is how the arm rests tend to "hug you" and you don't come into much contact with the water. Just depends on each individuals preference. We are very satisfied with this purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set of Intex pool floats as I’ve been using this particular float for nine years. I usually get a couple of “pool seasons” from a float before having to purchase new ones. They are very affordable and for the money I’ve found they hold up well. And believe me my grandkids give these floats a “workout” in the pool every year.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn R

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - Gets Sticky Over Time
customer_reviews.text: So I've bought these two years in a row due to their great design and unmatched price. They look great, are comfortable and have to convenient leg hole and cup holder. However the material they are made out of deteriorates quickly in the sun. It's not visibly noticeable, but in less-than-a-summer the plastic becomes sticky. Touching or sitting on them makes your skin sticky. While I want to completely love these floaties, I won't be buying them any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D Slaughterback

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I love this raft for the comfort. I have had many of them, but I have bought my last one. They continually come apart at the seams. I bought my most recent one 3 weeks ago and it now has a huge hole in one of the seams. Very hard to patch. I am an adult with no kids and do not mistreat it. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 of these. 30 days later only one is holding air. Only used a couple times by 10 yr kids in the pool only. They just randomly start coming apart at the seams. Can't be returned, as I'm at 32 days. Wasted money, kids unhappy, and no I didn't over inflate the air in this junk. Not able to give zero rating.
customer_reviews.author: Billy J. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Well this came with a slow leak in the seam of the back rest. The included patch did not help since it is in the seam. I have to blow it up every other day. The reason I keep doing so is other than that I love it. It was just the right size and has great support. I would have sent it back to exchange but it had been in the pool for two days and drying it off packaging in a new box and having to go out for shipping during a pandemic was not worth it. Overall I like it enough I would still buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy79

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: These floats are awesome. But this time i took a step out and ordered from different vendor lesson learnt. Was rolled up in a bag with its original box opened in the bag as well had grass and debri on it as if it was someone elses return order im sooo sure of. And just diverted to me. We blehw it of course had holes under air plug. This was a bad business decision. Next time only use the vendor i know thats sells new purchase. NEW
customer_reviews.author: Swain

customer_reviews.title: Why can't I buy more than one??
customer_reviews.text: Update: I'm updating my review to three stars because the customer service is great and I received a refund because I wasn't happy. Original review: It's still pretty crazy that I can't buy more than one!! I want a set for my pool. I'll inflate this one and update this review however I would like to know why I am limited to one!! I did a search for other pool floats and found out I can buy a set from the same company for $30.70 but I'm limited to the one I bought for $11.60! I also found another float which was exactly the same one from the same company for $14.99! This makes no sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphingirl

customer_reviews.title: 1 step closer to walking on water.
customer_reviews.text: Great product - but kind of deflated rather fast. I used our air mattress pump to blow them up and it took a few minutes, so that was neat. The only problem was they started to deflate a little before we even sat on them. Not enough to not float, but enough where it seemed like the seal might not be doing it's job entirely. Nonetheless, my friends and I lounged on them out in the water and both my tall friends found them very comfortable. (one is 6' 1" and the other 6'3") so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Darcimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: My favorite floatie
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite floaties, super fun to float in and relaxing. Great to dip your feet in the water and stay comfortable with back support seat. I usually have to buy a new one every season they don't last too long. Still my to go floatie every time!
customer_reviews.author: KFamily

customer_reviews.title: DON’T purchase
customer_reviews.text: Twice I tried to get amazon to make it right. Once they did. Last time, they were so rude& told me so much as to bugger off. I almost drowned. Float just deflated in pool & the repair kit was CRAP!!!! Used before trying to float before I almost drowned. Person on Amazon line was an arse. Site wouldn’t download criticism due to overloaded criticism about product . Talking to a lawyer
customer_reviews.author: William Choate

customer_reviews.title: Favorite with the kids
customer_reviews.text: Every year I buy several different types of floats for the pool and this one is hands down the favorite with all the kids. Regardless of the age, everyone wants to use this float. The cup holder is great for keeping a chilly drink close. Comfortable and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Drake

customer_reviews.title: if you are a comfortable sized adult you may look for a little more ...
customer_reviews.text: bought these back when they were on sale, so the price was right. arrived quickly as prime does, but the durability is just not there, if you are a comfortable sized adult you may look for a little more enduring, forgiving, whatever..... when grandma tries to get on it and the seam bust out its not a good thing, not once but twice, I bought 6 (one for every member) so far blew up three and two seams busted out in nearly the same spot. maybe a person of smaller statue under 50 yrs. 5' 3" 150lbs would be different.
customer_reviews.author: TJ WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Only Half Great
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this inflatable King Kool lounge for years and years at our local discount store. Usually, they last a whole season, maybe two summer seasons if we're lucky. So, I was thrilled when I found this 2-Pack on Amazon for much less than the local store. Unfortunately, one of the floats did not float straight out of the box, and the second float made it most of the way through one season, but not the entire season. I thought I saved money, but in the end I ended up paying more money for one, because the second float never worked. Very disappointed.... Intex, time to look at your manufacturing procedures!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Must be a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these already and really liked it so I bought two more on Amazon. When they arrived I inflated them and they lasted about an hour before the seams separated in the same place on both of them. This looks like they have a bad batch since the original one I bought in April is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: RDUBYA

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! Long lasting, comfortable pool lounger that lasts for years, (unless your nephew tries to topple his father, who in an attempt to stay upright yanks up on the arm literally ripping it off the attached surface😒)
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Material becomes degraded with time.
customer_reviews.text: I only have this product a 2 star rating because the plastic on both floats I bought got all gummy. No one wants to use them now because they’re gross. It’s too bad because they’re pretty comfortable and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: wendyfromhome

customer_reviews.title: my most favorite floaty
customer_reviews.text: This is my most favorite floaty. I buy one every summer. I love it for the pool when it's a little chilly & you just want to float around. It's a great way to relax and it has a drink holder. It's very durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outlasted our expensive floats!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered many floats on amazon and these were cheap at outlasted the expensive ones. I typically would pick these up at big box stores yearly but due to covid Glad I could order here and a little cheaper too!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: great float - especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I hate overpaying and I feel I got a good deal. We had to work at getting them inflated (I bought two) and ended up using a power air bed thingy. Once inflated I was a happy camper. They're great for the pool and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: lkmorter

customer_reviews.title: Just float!
customer_reviews.text: Expect to get a short swim season (I live in MIchigan) out of these but for this price, it’s worth it. I love these loungers in the pool. I will not leave in the shed over the winter to see it makes a difference. Also, I tried to use the repair kit over a pin hole and it fell off in an hour. Still I think if I buy a set each season for this price it’s worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Pennyfred

customer_reviews.title: Arm rest seam split after 2 months. It was worth $7
customer_reviews.text: The price was only $7 when I purchased so it was a good buy. The left arm seam split underneath a week after the return policy ran up. It lasted 2 months so I’m not too upset about this purchase. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST...
customer_reviews.text: These floats are the best. Not only are they comfortable, but they're more durable than any float I've ever had. I've had 2 of them for about 3 yrs and ever year I re-inflate them and they always hold the same air for the entire summer. You can't go wrong..!!
customer_reviews.author: Smithoffred

customer_reviews.title: This product will not last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in March 2020 and by June 2020 it broke at the seam. The poor quality is incredible to last 3 month. If you paid more than $7.99 you over paid for this low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Torres

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality item...
customer_reviews.text: If not for the poor quality, it would be the perfect float. This is really a one season (if that long) item. Yesterday, the last one went to garbage. I ordered 2 last year. One was fine and the other one had a leak. They replaced it with no problem, didn't even ask me to send it back. In about 3 months the other one had the same issue. And now the last one is gone. This is a very nice and comfortable float, but only if you are lucky enough. For me it was 3 out of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Alex T

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Pool Float!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME pool float! It is the right size for a pool so you are not overtaking the pool from others. I ordered 3 different pool floats and this was my favorite. I am not on the "small side" of body type and it worked wonderfully for me. It doesn't keep you completely dry but in the middle of summer, it was perfect. Good headrest too if you want to lay down and dangle your feet in the water. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: kittycarle

customer_reviews.title: Nice,but not for big people
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and I. They're not for big people, luckily I'm 5'3" and I fit comfortably. A plus size person probably won't fit as comfortable. Overall they're nice lounging rafts.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love this one and decent price
customer_reviews.text: We tried several types of loungers for our pool, and this one is my favorite. Sadly, with 3 months of very heavy use, the back finally tore off and the raft deflated. That will not deter me from getting another one--it is that comfy and fun. Maybe best for medium to smaller people. Mine gave up the ghost one a larger person was pushing against the backrest to sit up higher. Kind of funny when the back blew off and they fell in. :)
customer_reviews.author: PalliNurse

customer_reviews.title: Adult size float
customer_reviews.text: This item comes in a very small size, it's not adult size at all or for at least someone that ways more than 150 lbs and taller than 4 1/2 feet. I had to give this one to my 6 year old granddaughter. I would search around for one that is bigger, more adult size.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Soley

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is the best float ever and the price was right. Only allowed 2 when I purchased. The upright seat is great, drink holder great and only get as wet as you want. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Prather

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Float
customer_reviews.text: Got these on an Amazon special. Ready for our second summer and they look as fresh as last summer. No leaks after inflating. Very comfortable for lounging around in the water. don't have any experience with how these would hold up under the rough and tumble use of kids but they do hold inflation well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: sjam

customer_reviews.title: ✮✮✮✮✮ VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: We had this particular model before. We liked the backrest so you can sit up and enjoy a cool drink and catch the action. IT WILL EASILY FIT A 6' PERSON! #1We got three years out of the old one. #2 WE PAID A WHOLE LOT MORE. With that said, we left it floating in the pool and never took it in till fall. If you stored it indoors when not in use= more years. At this Amazon price you could buy four of them for what I paid at another store for one.
customer_reviews.author: W T G

customer_reviews.title: Tough, Thick plastic, No Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I have had this float before. It lasted literally years and never had a leak. I threw it out at the end of last summer because I bought another type of float (a flat float) just to try something new but I did not like it as much and it developed leaks along the seams. That was never a problem with this float. The thicker plastic ensures that the rough and tumble of pool play never impacts it. I expect to get many years out of this float, same as the last one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Rough wild behavior deflated one of the two we purchased. The price was reasonable so we figured the fun had in its destruction was worth it. To use it's great. Can flip it over for flat float or enjoy the cup holder and relax in the pool or lake.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Loses air over a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Got it on a discounted price, so am satisfied with it. But this loses air quite easily. And it definitely will not last till next summer. So we bought several and expect each one to only have about a 1 year lifecycle. This fits best with Intex’s own air pump ... so definitely if you already have the pump, this is a quick and easy buy (especially when it’s on sale).
customer_reviews.author: B.E.W.

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great float but, mine came with a hole in it. Slowly deflated the entire day and it’s gone after one use. Very disappointing because it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with a hole and couldn’t return.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered all of our pool supplies, floats, etc. in the late spring to be ready for summertime. When it came time to blow up and enjoy we found there was a hole in it. When I went to return it was too late and I wasn’t given the option. It wasn’t very far past 30 days and I was disappointed because this was clearly a perfect round hole from the factory. Money completely wasted. Patching it didn’t work. Will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: durability an issue
customer_reviews.text: Lounges were very comfortable and easy to inflate. However there durability is an issue. After just a few days seams were leaking air. I did not feel we were overly ruff with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sroot

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: This float was great and comfortable for the first week. Unfortunately, it developed a hole and deflated after the first week of use! We cannot figure out where the hole is and therefore cannot fix it. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut73

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to inflate
customer_reviews.text: This float was impossible to inflate due to a connected piece of plastic that blocked air getting in. We had to use a power drill to break through that plastic seal. Other than that, it is an okay float. As for durability, we shall see!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! Cuts in product.
customer_reviews.text: CAME WITH 3 BIG SLASHES. THE CUT IS SO DEEO, IT WENT THROUGH! Cant even repair with water tape.. the slashes are about 4 inches long! VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzel's Mommypig

customer_reviews.title: Great for summertime play
customer_reviews.text: We love these floats. We just have a little 15' round, above ground pool, which we claim is for the grandchildren. Actually, it's for us to float on these lounges while having a gin and tonic at the end of our day... Notice the nice cup holder? Easy to blow up and use. Cheap enough to replace if it develops a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and is perfect in the pool lets just enough water in to keep you cool but not be soaked. Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: These are the best float lounges
customer_reviews.text: These are the best float lounges. We take them in our roller bags to our local lakes and float and drift all day.~I recommend purchasing a lightweight pump that inflates and deflates your lounge.~ These are Super comfy.~ I bought a small dry bag and attach it to the lounge ,then I can be on the water for hours with water, snacks, hat, sunscreen, and a sun shirt...I am sure these are great for pools too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: So much fun in the ocean!!
customer_reviews.text: Had so much fun with these in Hawaii! Would recommended this to anyone. We bought two for Hawaii and then took them a few months later to a California Beach Vacation but one developed a hole and would slowly deflate. It still worked but we didn't bring it home with us. We used it in a pool and the ocean and was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy lounge with sturdy vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Fairly sturdy vinyl should serve more than a few seasons, the lounge gives you several options for sitting. Double air compartments for added security. We took this down the Argo Cascades in Ann Arbor which is a more vigorous experience than sitting in the pool, and this held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Y. R. Wu

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite floaty loungers
customer_reviews.text: third season buying these for our pool. Great price (especially if you can find on sale) They hold up well through the season. I usually just toss them in the fall but they would be fine for a 2nd season, especially if you took better care of them than I do! (we just leave them out & they get pretty sun damaged by the end of the summer) Very comfortable for an adult, kids love them too
customer_reviews.author: Jen Downey

customer_reviews.title: Don't Invest in these
customer_reviews.text: We barely used these and in less than 1 month they had both popped. My spouse used them for laying in the sun with her friend. Both are petite. There is really no reason these should have malfunctioned so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy DeBruyn "Amy D"

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for summer fun in the pool
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice float for the money - you could spend a lot more, but probably not less and the quality is good. It's easy to get on and off - which is a big plus. In the unlikely event you get a small seam leak, there is a repair kit that I think would be easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Z Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice float, nice price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these floats. They are cheap and durable. I have bought them many times over the years for our pool. They even have a cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great price/great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I was looking forward to float around in the pool. Very comfortable and very easy to inflate, or deflate. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. I thought I was getting different colors, all are clear plastic. For that I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.author: annette lilly

customer_reviews.title: Priced way high
customer_reviews.text: The lounge itself is very good and easy to inflate. We only inflated it once and we have been playing it for almost three weeks. Almost no air leak. The reason I knocked one star off is that it is priced too high right now. It only costed $8 about one month ago. Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I love to rent houses in Palm Springs with pools. Once we came across these blow up "chairs" at a rental and loved them so much, we bought our own so we can take them with us and use them at every house. My friend has a fan that plugs in and blows them up, I recommend this since they take a lot of air! SO fun and comfortable. Sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, had punctures straight out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box upon delivery these had punctures and would not hold air. Was so very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: theShadow97

customer_reviews.title: Not holding air
customer_reviews.text: I buy these rafts every year and love them however when I took them out last night and blew them up they did not keep the air well. Had to add air to them twice today.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Wilson

customer_reviews.title: BEST float we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Product has lasted 3 seasons so far. Easy to inflate even by mouth if needed & well made. Haven't had issues with seams splitting or holes or slow leaking. Nice cup holder and cut out to put your feet in the water easily. Nice backrest that is independent from main body of raft so you can adjust it to have more or less back support, or not inflate for a flat mattress to lay on your stomach with. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sherry davis

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I always use these mats. But this time it was to costly in my opinion. However great quality
customer_reviews.author: GinB

customer_reviews.title: Amazingness
customer_reviews.text: These things rock. We used them in the pool for a couple weeks then took them on the sandbar. Literally the only ones on the lake left inflated after 12 hours of waves bumping then against the boats. Not at all tippy either. Definitely my new go to. I'll buy some every year.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Sielesnew

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed often, comfortable for reading and floating around
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year, one of 2 of my first purchases for the pool. Packed away w air, for FLorida winter, brought out, lasted half the summer...it did ripped on a seam, hardest one used area. 2nd air still in other, still packed away.
customer_reviews.author: Jack's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Dreaming of th pool
customer_reviews.text: Don't have a picture because my daughter only got to use it once. The temp has went down considerably. But the day my 42 year old used it. She way in the pool floating around for over an hour. She said it was really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: cecelia a. perrone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Ordered this a while back for Father’s Day gift. When I put out air in it I noticed the air was leaking out and discovered a small hole. We patched the hole but it shouldn’t have come this way. I’ve owned other Intex products and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: As described. Really nice & easy to stay on. Head rest makes it really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine
customer_reviews.text: Going on season 2 - not used a whole lot but left inflated by the lake for weeks at a time and just infused occasionally
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Love this float!
customer_reviews.text: We are looking forward to our 2nd year with the pool and this float. Still inflated. Very sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Evans Randolph

customer_reviews.title: I can't imagine I wont LOVE IT. One of the best things to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I have not used this yet as it's been too cold in the Northeast to swim the last few weeks.....but this was on a lightening deal for a little over $5!!! At that price, I can't imagine I wont LOVE IT. One of the best things to do is to float around in the pool with a good book and I think th is lounger will definitely work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for humans and dogs! I like that it was easy to fill (using an air pump). It arrived quickly and was packaged well. I got it for my son, but my dog uses it the most. We use the cup holder to add cold water for my dog to drink. He loves it. The price is great for all the fun-we’ve has with it. Seems durable enough to last the summer and beyond. Adults can sit on it also. It’s very relaxing and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joy E

customer_reviews.title: they work great on the lake to get around
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years, they work great on the lake to get around. You can use you arms or put your legs in the hole area and use your legs also to get around. I have had the float deflate while way out and got back safe, it has two separate Chambers therefore you also have the back pillow part to use to keep you up, that wasn't necessary though, it kept me up to get back, I can swim therefore was not worried, fantastic to know you really don't have to worry, but for safety, never go out so far you would need a lot of time to get back. Happy floating!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Float away!
customer_reviews.text: I get a float like this every summer. Great if you like to read and float.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not for the overweight apparently...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the float but it must not be made for overweight people because I’ve had two now and both broke within weeks of owning. Both floats tore at the seam where the arm rest meets the base. Disappointing because I did really enjoy the float.
customer_reviews.author: charles turner

customer_reviews.title: Tore in one day
customer_reviews.text: Last time I'm purchasing any Intex Pool Rafts or tubes. Just like with past purchases of other Intex brand pool floats, a hold tore in it after just 1 day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Rougue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect... once.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect float while it lasted! I spent a wonderful day at the lake with a book and a drink... couldn't have been happier. Deflated and attempted to reinflate, and it wouldn't hold air. For the price, I was still happy with my day, but wished I could have used it again.
customer_reviews.author: Burr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lounger for the water. Hope they improve cup holder.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the lounge chair for all our trips to lakes for the summer and they did not disappoint. Definitely a must to have an air pump of some kind to inflate. My only complaint is the cup holder - needs to be larger to fit a larger diameter bottle (think Nalgene size or Crowler) and place it closer to the armrest. :D Not a big nitpick but those details would have made this lounger amazing.
customer_reviews.author: The New Mean Mrs. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: A good float for relaxing in the pool
customer_reviews.text: I love these loungers. I usually order 3 or 4 each summer. We have a pool and everyone uses one to float around and enjoy visiting in the pool. If your family is rough and tumble in the pool these may not be the best choice as they are a little delicate where the arms & back attach to the platform. But for easy use they are comfy and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great lounge, good price
customer_reviews.text: I love this inflatable lounge chair! It is quite versatile. When fully inflated it is very comfortable- great for sitting up and reading. You can also deflate the top pillow used for the head rest and then flip it over for lounging fully prone. It stays fully inflated even when the temps rise and it’s left in the sun. Good price, great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Likesavalue

customer_reviews.title: Great raft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a survival raft on my 36 foot sea cruiser. My yacht sank and I was lost at sea for a week and this thing kept me afloat and saved my life. Love the cup holder too.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Great float
customer_reviews.text: Great $5 float! Looks just as advertised, and is better quality than I thought. Frequently float on it with a beer can in the built-in holder. Water does come in through the back so you will get wet while you float. The headrest makes me prefer it to my other donut float. Good value. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luma

customer_reviews.title: Favorite float
customer_reviews.text: Great price, well made pool float. It is nice to have the back piece where you can sit up on the float. Great design and feel. We have purchased several of these over the years.
customer_reviews.author: litcoach1

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy & durable!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I was able to find this float on amazon!! I couldn’t find this one in stores- they are my favorite King Kool float!! Very durable, very comfortable & they last!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mjo

customer_reviews.title: Overall a cute product but was useless as the top portion of this kept deflating
customer_reviews.text: Overall a cute product but was useless as the top portion of this kept deflating. It was obvious that it was defective with either a hole somewhere or whatever other reason is... Bottom portion stayed firm but I couldn't use it to lay on it so had t throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Ulviya

customer_reviews.title: Pool Lounger
customer_reviews.text: This is my float. I do not share. It fits my oversized butt and it seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: DebiCB

customer_reviews.title: Great price , durable
customer_reviews.text: We used our compressor to fill. So it was easy to inflate. Pretty durable, left it In the the pool in direct sunlight all summer and it’s still on great shape. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jessie.S

customer_reviews.title: Kids approve
customer_reviews.text: Purchase more than one so everyone can enjoy to sit or sun when in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy float
customer_reviews.text: Used at beach and these are so comfy!!! I bought 1 for me and 1 for my friend that pregnant and almost weights 200 and it kept her up out of water. She said it gave her great support to be comfy. I loved it just as much too. I'll be buying more if it proves its durability after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Britt R

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: my favorite pool float in the heat of summer. I bought 4 of them for the summer of 2018. I am only giving it 4 stars because you have to be careful with these or they will tear and lose air. And they will tear in a spot that isn't fixable with a repair patch. Try just one. It will soon be your favorite float too.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Manypenny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for great floatee.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for great floatee. We bought two, then another.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald M. Tuckman

customer_reviews.title: Floats my boat.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect float. Used on at the fairmont hotel in Dallas and it was great in a shallow edge with the hole for your feet to keep you anchored and cool. It keeps your body out of the water so you can grab all the suns rays. Can drink holder is great. Very comfortable. Just buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: Lively and Modern Mom

product_meta.title: Intex King Kool Inflatable Lounge, 63" X 33.5" , 1 Pack (Colors May Vary)
product_meta.description:
King Kool Inflatable Lounge, 63" X 33.5" , 1 Pack

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
63" x 33.5" King Kool Lounge - The classic pool lounger has only gotten better with age. With its comfy back and arm rest and drink holder, you may never want to get out of the pool.This lounge comes in 2 assorted colors Clear top, blue or gold vinyl bottom. Cannot specify color.
feature_bullets: Transparent top with multi-colored I beams
Drink holder, arm rests and backrests
Great for floating the pool in comfort.
This lounge comes in 2 assorted colors Clear top, blue or gold vinyl bottom. Cannot specify color.
